name: Lucrecia

specials.name: Change Shape
specials.description: % can take on the appearance of a Medium humanoid. This doesn’t change her Speed or her attack and damage modifiers with her Strikes, but it does prevent her from using her cursed touch. % has a fixed humanoid form—she cannot adopt a different appearance each time she uses this ability, and her appearance resembles that of her upper torso when in her true form.

specials.name: Dervish Strike
specials.description: % makes an attack against each enemy within reach. Each attack counts toward her multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until after all the attacks. The first enemy she damages is subject to matriarch’s caress.

specials.name: Matriarch's Caress
specials.description: % touches a creature, who must succeed at a DC [dc] Will save or become stupefied 1 (stupefied 2 if critically failed). If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 if failed or 2 if critically failed (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

specials.name: Constrictor tail
specials.description: Trigger: A creature within 5 ft. critically fails an Athletics check or melee strike. Effect: % attempts an Athletics check to grapple the creature with her tail, needing no free hands.

specials.name: Constrict
specials.description:
Requirements % has a smaller creature grabbed. 
Effect: % deals 20 bludgeoning damage to the grabbed creature; the creature must attempt a basic Fortitude save.

specials.name: Magic Tattoo
specials.description:
Frequency: once per day. 
Effect: The next spontaneous spell % casts undergoes the effects of the Silent Spell and Conceal Spell metamagic feats.
